meanings.definition: A cogenerator is a person or thing that generates power or electricity.
meanings.sent1: The cogenerators at the power plant work tirelessly to produce electricity.
meanings.sent2: We rely on cogenerators to keep the lights on in our homes.
meanings.sent3: The little robot claimed to be a cogenerator of energy, amusing the children.
meanings.sent4: Her positivity was like a cogenerator, lighting up the room with energy.
meanings.sent5: The cogenerators hummed softly, filling the air with power.

meanings.definition: Cogenerators are devices that produce both heat and electricity simultaneously.
meanings.sent1: The new cogenerators efficiently provide heat and electricity for the building.
meanings.sent2: Many industries use cogenerators to save energy and costs.
meanings.sent3: The talking toaster joked that it was a cogenerator of warmth and toast, amusing the family.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a cogenerator, spreading warmth and light to everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The cogenerators buzzed harmoniously, creating a blend of heat and power.
